00018                 HResult _Chain(void *pThis, void* pChain, SF_RIID riid, void **ppv)
00019                 {
00020                         _CHAINDATA* pcd = static_cast<_CHAINDATA*>(pChain);
00021                         void* p = adjustptr(pThis, pcd->dwOffset);
00022                         return _QueryInterface(p, pcd->pFunc(), riid, ppv);
00023                 }
00024 
00026 
00027                 HResult _QueryInterface(void* pThis, const INTERFACE_MAP_ENTRY* pEntries, SF_RIID riid, void** ppvObject)
00028                 {
00029                         // To avoid ambiguity always cast first entry to IUnknown
00030                         if (riid == uuid_of(IUnknown))
00031                         {
00032                                 // first entry must be an offset
00033                                 assert( pEntries->locator == SF_OFFSET_ENTRY );
00034                                 *ppvObject = adjustptr(pThis, reinterpret_cast<size_t>(pEntries->OffChain));
00035                                 static_cast<IUnknown*>(*ppvObject)->AddRef();
00036                                 return SF_S_OK;
00037                         }
00038                         else
00039                         {
00040                                 HResult hr = SF_E_NOINTERFACE;
00041                                 // until end
00042                                 while (pEntries->locator)
00043                                 {
00044                                         if (!pEntries->piid || (riid == *pEntries->piid))
00045                                         {
00046                                                 if (pEntries->locator == SF_OFFSET_ENTRY)
00047                                                 {
00048                                                         *ppvObject = adjustptr(pThis, reinterpret_cast<size_t>(pEntries->OffChain));
00049                                                         static_cast<IUnknown*>(*ppvObject)->AddRef();
00050                                                         hr = SF_S_OK;
00051                                                         break;
00052                                                 }
00053                                                 else
00054                                                 {
00055                                                         hr = pEntries->locator(pThis, pEntries->OffChain, riid, ppvObject);
00056                                                         if (hr == SF_S_OK)
00057                                                                 break;
00058                                                 }
00059                                         }
00060                                         ++pEntries;
00061                                 }
00062                                 if (hr != SF_S_OK)
00063                                         *ppvObject = 0;
00064                                 return hr;
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067 
00069 
00070         } // detail
00071 
00072 } // namespace

00075 
00076 bool implements_interface(module::IUnknown* pUnk, const module::guid& riid)
00077 {
00079 
00080         if(pUnk)
00081         {
00082                 void* dummy;
00083                 if(SF_SUCCEEDED(pUnk->QueryInterface(riid, &dummy)))
00084                 {
00085                         // Compensate reference
00086                         pUnk->Release();
00087                         return true;
00088                 }
00089         }
00090         return false;
00091 }
